title: Wednesday night's supermoon could worsen flooding from Idalia
description: Hurricane Idalia makes landfall in Florida as Category 3 storm, brings damage: Live updates

title: Florida residents who rode out Hurricane Idalia had to 'swim out of their windows,' couple says
description: Some Florida Gulf Coast residents who chose to ride out Hurricane Idalia at home instead of evacuating were forced to “swim out of their windows” to escape waves of water crashing through their front doors early Wednesday morning.

title: How Hurricane Idalia went from a Category 1 to a Category 4 overnight
description: Warm waters in the Gulf of Mexico helped fuel Hurricane Idalia’s rapid intensification hours before it made landfall, a phenomenon that experts say will likely occur more often in a warming world.

title: Drone video captures Tampa flooding from Hurricane Idalia
description: Drone video taken by NBC News affiliate WFLA shows flooding on Bayshore Blvd. in Tampa, Fla., as a result of Hurricane Idalia.

title: Watch: Gas station awning topples under Idalia's winds
description: Video shows the moment powerful winds from Hurricane Idalia topple a gas station awning in Perry, Fla.

title: Idalia becomes eighth major hurricane to make landfall in U.S. since 2017
description: Idalia has added to an extraordinary stretch of major hurricanes making landfall in the United States.

title: Florida's Apalachee Bay hit by major hurricane for first time in recorded history
description: Idalia became the first major hurricane to enter Apalachee Bay since modern record-keeping started in 1851.

title: Videos and photos capture Hurricane Idalia's impact as streets flooded, trees downed
description: As Hurricane Idalia makes its way across Florida, images and videos capturing the storm's wrath are spreading across social media as heavy rains and wind batter the state.

title: YouTube’s ‘canceled’ stars are making comebacks with TikTok, podcasts and livestreams
description: For some influencers, being canceled isn’t career-ending — it’s the launchpad to a fresh start.

title: NBC reporter braves 100 mph winds during Idalia report from Perry, Florida
description: NBC News’ Gabe Gutierrez reports from Perry, Fla., where wind gusts are hitting over 100 MPH as Hurricane Idalia, a Category 3 storm, makes landfall and begins to move through the state.

title: Start TODAY Wellness Awards: Top picks in gadgets, apparel, more
description: In the first-ever Start TODAY Wellness Awards, Adrianna Brach shares the winning products across numerous categories from gadgets and equipment to apparel. Top picks include the Nutribullet Pro 900, Reebok Princess Sneakers, the Theragun Mini and much more!

title: Hurricane Idalia makes landfall on Florida’s Gulf Coast
description: Hurricane Idalia made landfall on Florida’s Gulf Coast with intense wind speeds and the threat of a dangerous storm surge. NBC’s Gabe Gutierrez and Marissa Parra report and Al Roker tracks the forecast for TODAY.

title: Tesla ordered by auto regulators to provide data on ‘Elon mode’ Autopilot configuration
description: Tesla has received a special order from federal automotive safety regulators requiring the company to provide extensive data about its driver assistance and driver monitoring systems, and a once secret configuration for these known as “Elon mode.”

title: Tampa braces itself for Hurricane Idalia's onslaught
description: NBC News' Marissa Parra reports from Tampa, Florida, where the city has prepared for Hurricane Idalia to make landfall to its north.

title: Fears over Florida immigration law surface as residents prepare for Hurricane Idalia
description: Latino groups urge Florida residents to seek help, shelter regardless of immigration status despite fears over Gov. Ron DeSantis' restrictive immigration law.

title: Florida braces for Hurricane Idalia to make landfall
description: Florida is preparing for Hurricane Idalia as the state is threatened with record-setting storm surge and significant flooding. NBC News’ Al Roker, Tom Llamas and Gabe Gutierrez have the latest weather updates.

title: Hurricane Idalia tracker: Follow its path
description: With Hurricane Idalia set to hit Florida, learn more about its possible path and how those in the way of the storm should brace themselves.

title: Idalia expected to slam into Florida as a dangerous Category 4 hurricane
description: Nearly all of Florida's west coast is under tornado watch as Hurricane Idalia bears down

title: Maui victims seek ex-consultant’s files on what Hawaiian Electric knew about wildfire risks
description: Lawyers for victims suing Hawaiian Electric over this month’s deadly wildfire in Maui have subpoenaed a former consultant for the public utility, seeking his correspondence with top utility officials about their knowledge of wildfire risks and necessary upgrades to its power grid, according to a recent court filing.

title: Proud Boys could get record sentences this week in Jan. 6 seditious conspiracy case
description: Enrique Tarrio could face the longest prison sentence of any Jan. 6 defendant when a judge hands down punishments this week for members of the Proud Boys.

title: Democrats push for investigation of Ryan Walters, Oklahoma’s firebrand schools superintendent
description: Oklahoma Democrats are calling for an impeachment probe of Ryan Walters, the state superintendent, following bomb threats against a Tulsa-area school district.

title: Jacksonville gunman stayed in room after dropping out of college, losing job, father says in 911 audio
description: The Jacksonville shooter used to work at a dollar store and stopped in at one before a security guard’s presence apparently led him to instead target the Dollar General down the road, where he killed three people.
